channel.title: Help with fixing doors in PI
channel.description: Well im getting better in code editing guys, but im still a little slow in code writing can any one help me fix the door problems ive been having in PI? Im trying to make it to where I can open certain doors like inside lumby castle or some random doors like the lumby cows gate its on the cfg. file but I cant get (Edit: the gate) to open. any help?

item.title: Help with fixing doors in PI
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Let me rephrase my question at the end their, I can open the cfg. file but not the gate in lumby

Read full topic
item.source: Help with fixing doors in PI

item.description:

Right click on the Doors.cfg and press Open Withâ€¦ and chose Notepad.
